# agent-evals

> TypeScript-native eval framework for AI agent workflows. Record-replay, deterministic graders, LLM-as-judge, CI integration.

## Docs

- [Getting Started](/getting-started/quick-start/)
- [CLI Reference](/reference/cli/)
- [Graders API](/reference/graders-api/)
- [Config Reference](/reference/config/)
- [Plugin API](/reference/plugin-api/)
- [Record & Replay Guide](/guides/record-replay/)
- [CI Integration](/guides/ci-integration/)
- [MCP Server](/advanced/mcp-server/)
